summary: Beyond Skyrim presents brand new ship and rowboat meshes inspired by Cyrodilic culture, this resource contains a remake of Oblivions famous galleon, and a brand new rowboat. These assets are completely lore friendly, and can be used however you wish, be sure to check out the readme file for some additional info.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This is yet another Beyond Skyrim resource release, this time a remake of Oblivions Galleon and a brand new rowboat inspired by Cyrodilic culture. For info on future releases and other updates about Beyond Skyrim, like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BeyondSkyrim

_______________________
Content:

Oblivion Galleon Remake: The ship is divided into two different nif files, one for the masts and the ropes, and one for the hull, does not include interiors (yet)

Cyrodiilic Rowboat: Contains a brand new rowboat, complete and ruined versions. It's the same size and colour as the Skyrim rowboat, but is shaped differently.


[color=#ff0000]Original 3d Studio max work files (for easy editing) of the ship and the rowboat can be provided upon request[/color].
_______________________
Installation:

1 - Place the meshes folder in your skyrim Data folder.
2 - Open the Creation Kit, right click on any static object and select "New" this will open up a new Static window.
3 - In the model tab, select "Edit" this opens up the Reference window, click on "Edit Base".
4 - Navigate to the meshes folder, and select one of the nif files.
5 - give the object a new name and save.


_______________________
Known Issues and bugs:

LOD model has not been tested

_______________________
Credits:

Markus Liberty (Tellmann) - for the modelling and texturing of all assets in this resource
Tamira - for assisting in merging collisions and fixing a collision mesh bug for the Imperial Ship
1shoedpunk - for assisting in merging collisions for the rowboats

_______________________
Contact info:
